Emma Spagnola
Recruitment Consultant - Data Science (Phoenix) at Harnham
Harnham is looking for an experienced and skilled Senior Director of Data Science to join our client's inclusive and collaborative team. This full-time Data Science Director role is fully remote and offers great opportunities to make an impact.As a Senior Director of Data Science, you will develop and direct a deeply integrated data team with product and engineering and company-wide stakeholders, including sales, marketing, supplier relations, and finance.In your first few weeks in this Data Science Director job, you can expect to:· Partner with product, engineering, and other cross-functional managers to direct analytics and insights-guided decision-making throughout the business· Work with the VP of Data to develop, obtain support, and implement a short, medium, and long-term data roadmap and strategy· Direct quarterly and monthly planning processes and weekly sprints· Recruit great data scientists, data engineers, and data analysts in collaboration with the company's recruiting teamTo apply for this Director of Data Science role, you will need 10+ years of relevant experience in data analytics, data science, or machine learning. You will also require the following:· At least 6 years as an individual contributor and at least 4 years directing a data team· A PhD or MS in a quantitative field such as statistics, economics, mathematics, sciences, or engineering· Expert knowledge of a scientific computing language (such as Python or R) and SQL· Expertise in statistics and machine learning and a history of empowering whole organizations to use data by making data robust, well-structured, and self-serve· Management experience in an analytical role at a growth-stage companyIf you’re looking to impact and create change positively, you will be rewarded with an excellent salary of circa $200,000 plus bonus and equity and a great benefits package for your inclusive and committed approach. To learn more and apply for this full-time Senior Director of Data Science opportunity in please get in touch with Emma Spagnola today. We look forward to hearing from you!
